moves.name: Venom Drench
moves.description: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

moves.name: Fell Stinger
moves.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises sharply.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Poison Sting
moves.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

moves.name: String Shot
moves.description: The targets are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth. This silk reduces the targets' Speed stat.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Constrict
moves.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Scary Face
moves.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

moves.name: Constrict
moves.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Leech Life
moves.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes for two to five times in quick succession.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Spider Web
moves.description: The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can't flee from battle.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Pin Missile
moves.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Poison Jab
moves.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.

moves.name: Cross Poison
moves.description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also leave the target poisoned. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Sticky Web
moves.description: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.
